page.title: 09LANDSCAPE
page.content: { SOURCE { The River Usk}begins in the Carmarthen Van. Then it runs through Brecon,Abergavenny,Usk,Caerleon and it ends up at Newport. { THE 1979 FLOODS. There was heavy rain which caused more water to flow down than normal. The bridge held back the strong flow of water.The water was held back by the strong tide which caused the flood at the Usk Bridge. { THE FLOOD PREVENTION SCHEME. Since 1981 they have widened the river Usk and they have evened out the bottom.They have graded back the banks and cut down all the old trees and made it a lot neater and safer.In case of a flood they have reinforced the banks with rocks.
